item.title: ICE Is Poaching Local Officers, Angering Some Police Chiefs and Sheriffs
item.description: The agency’s aggressive recruiting, including a $50,000 signing bonus, is hurting staffing in local agencies.

item.description: St. Louis native Shamari Jackson began studying mortuary science after her boyfriend was fatally shot. Now she uses her work as a form of therapy.

item.description: The children of Lance Shockley, Marcellus “Khaliifah” Williams Sr. and Kevin Johnson shed light on oft-forgotten experiences.

item.title: Mississippi Prison Chief Reopens Homicide Cases Following News Investigation

item.description: The directors of ‘The Alabama Solution’ discuss their piercing new documentary and what they hope people will take away from the film.
